<cs> my lords i submit myself with all humility and gratitude to her majestys gracious commands <e> <s> it is now my duty in the name of and on behalf of the commons of the united kingdom to lay claim by humble petition to her majesty to all their ancient and undoubted rights and privileges especially to freedom of speech in debate to freedom from arrest and to free access to her majesty whenever occasion shall require and that the most favourable construction shall be put upon all their proceedings <e> <s> with regard to myself i pray that if in the discharge of my duties i shall inadvertently fall into any error it may be imputed to myself alone and not to her majestys most faithful commons <e>
